allow: Bash(find lib/shared/widgets -name "*.dart" -exec sh -c 'lines=$(wc -l < ""$1""); if [ ""$lines"" -le 5 ]; then echo ""$1 ($lines lines)""; fi' _ {} ;)

Bash(find "C:\flutterprojects\thexeasonapp\thexeasonapp\lib\presentation\features" -name "*.dart" -exec sh -c 'lines=$(wc -l < ""$1"" 2>/dev/null); if [ ""$lines"" -gt 10 ]; then echo ""IMPLEMENTED: $1""; elif [ ""$lines"" -eq 0 ]; then echo ""EMPTY: $1""; else echo ""PLACEHOLDER: $1""; fi' _ {} ;)
